name: Bit/terness
description:
They share a bond... a heart. Bit/terness is a short-story platformer about the bond between an inventor and his robot. 

You'll play as an unnamed inventor, that will solve puzzles with his trusty robot. Our group wanted to add dialogue to guide the player on their journey, but as time was short and the dialogue was unable to get progressed in time. I hope you enjoy the story nonetheless. 

Controls:

AD - Move

W - Interact

S - Toggle between commands, "Follow" and "Stay"

Hold R - Reset Level

Follow - Allows the robot to follow the player's movements

Stay - Commands the robot to stay still.

Notes

If not stated, color machines relate to color doors or switches.
